selected_quotes: Ancient DNA supports a possible 3500 y. old expansion out of Eurasia into Africa
Ancient DNA from Mota (Ethiopia) proves 3500 y. old expansion out of Eurasia into Africa
Genomes of African humans shows evidence of prehistoric peoples from the Middle East migrating into Africa.
Looks like migration ~4500 years ago was INTO Africa, and affected populations all over the continent.
@KaraCooney Oh! Oh! Out of Africa Theory may be in trouble.

news.title: DNA-Analyse belegt massive Einwanderung nach Afrika
news.summary: In Afrika liegt die Wiege des modernen Menschen. Vor dort aus begann er, die Welt zu bevölkern.

news.title: Jahrtausendealte DNA entschlüsselt: Wanderung nach Afrika größer als bekannt - n-tv.de
news.summary: Wissen Freitag, 09. Oktober 2015 Aus dem Schädelknochen eines Mannes in Äthiopien gelingt es Forschern, 4500 Jahre altes Erbgut zu gewinnen.

news.title: What genome of ancient Ethiopian skeleton tell us about reverse migration
news.summary: An ancient skeleton of an Ethiopian man has given researchers clues about human migration back into Africa some 3,500 years ago.

news.title: First ancient African genome sequenced, finding surprising migration pattern - Redorbit
news.summary: Some 200,000 years ago, Homo sapiens arose in Africa, and began spreading across the globe some 100 to 150 thousand years later.

news.title: Prehistoric Eurasians streamed into Africa, genome shows
news.summary: Science 9 October 2015: Vol. 350 no. 6257 p. 149 DOI: 10.1126/science.350.6257.149 In Depth Human Evolution Summary Geneticists have sequenced the first prehistoric genome from Africa: that of Mota, a hunter-gatherer man who lived 4500 years ago in…

news.title: Prehistoric Eurasians streamed into Africa, genome shows
news.summary: Science 9 October 2015: Vol. 350 no. 6257 p. 149 DOI: 10.1126/science.350.6257.149 In Depth Human Evolution Summary Geneticists have sequenced the first prehistoric genome from Africa: that of Mota, a hunter-gatherer man who lived 4500 years ago in…

news.title: Eldgammelt DNA i Afrika røper innvandring fra nordøst
news.summary: Vi stammer alle fra Afrika. Men etter å ha vandret ut fra det afrikanske kontinentet til Asia og Europa, dro noen tilbake igjen.
